DataStax Data Architect

A blog for my projects at Datastax


Follow me on GitHub

About Me

My name is Steven Matison and I am a Data Architect at DataStax. I began my journey at Datastax on 8/28/2020. I am currently working in the following technologies: cassandra, astra, stargate, graph, graphql, nosqlbench, java, python, maven, docker, ansible, k8ssanrda, kubernetes, spark, nifi, kafka, and pulsar.

 

Current Projects

 

Datastax DBaaS Astra

tags: datastax, astra, cassandra, rest, api, nifi, ansible, postman

 

Datastax & Kubernetes

DataStax NoSQLBench

tags: datastax, nosqlbench, cassandra, nosql, open source

 

Stargate

The new open source api framework for distributed data.

tags: stargate, cassandra, nosql, json, api, graphql, open source
